subject: Steroids
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: Shane Mosley voiced his frustration with a report that accused him of using designer steroids as part of a doping regimen before a 2003 fight against Oscar De La Hoya.
snippet: Shane Mosley voiced his frustration with a report that accused him of using designer steroids as part of a doping regimen before a 2003 fight against Oscar De La Hoya.
